text: eemaanavaalon mein se ve log jo bina kisee kaaran ke baithe rahate hai aur jo allaah ke maarg mein apane dhan aur praanon ke saath jee-tod koshish karate hai, donon samaan nahin ho sakate. allaah ne baithe rahanevaalon kee apeksha apane dhan aur praanon se jee-tod koshish karanevaalon ka darja badha rakha hai. yadyapi pratyake ke lie allaah ne achchhe badale ka vachan diya hai. parantu allaah ne jee-tod koshish karanevaalon ka bada badala rakha hai
